# Module: tf.contrib.keras.constraints



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/keras/api/keras/constraints/__init__.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.3/tensorflow/contrib/keras/api/keras/constraints/__init__.py).

Keras built-in constraints functions.

## Classes

[`class MaxNorm`](../../../tf/contrib/keras/constraints/MaxNorm): MaxNorm weight constraint.

[`class NonNeg`](../../../tf/contrib/keras/constraints/NonNeg): Constrains the weights to be non-negative.

[`class UnitNorm`](../../../tf/contrib/keras/constraints/UnitNorm): Constrains the weights incident to each hidden unit to have unit norm.

[`class max_norm`](../../../tf/contrib/keras/constraints/MaxNorm): MaxNorm weight constraint.
